overview.en: Global Human Trust (GHT) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Global Human Trust has a current supply of 50,000,000 with 0 in circulation. The last known price of Global Human Trust is 43.08704952 USD and is down -0.12 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 1 active market(s) with $235,815.42 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://ght.dtsgroup.co.nz/.
